text: The shekel will consist of twenty gerahs.45:12 20 gerahs is equivalent to one shekel (approximately 0.4 ounces or 11.4 grams). Twenty shekels plus twenty-five shekels plus fifteen shekels will equal one mina.45:12 That is, 60 shekels total; elsewhere, the common mina was 50 shekels. Sixty shekels weighed approximately 1.5 pounds or 683.8 grams.
